Department of Computer Science     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Department of Computer Science      Department of Computer Science   Main Menu    Undergraduate           Admitted Students    Admissions    Accreditation    CS Major    CS Minor    Courses    Internships and Jobs    Student Groups    Student Profiles    Student Resources    Women in CS         Graduate           Admitted Students    Admissions    Courses    MS Program    PhD Program    PhD Dissertations    Post-Graduation Outcomes    Student Profiles    Student Resources         Research           Research Areas    Labs    Lectures and Seminars    Research Experiences for Undergraduates         Faculty and Staff           Department Head    Faculty    Emeritus Faculty    Adjunct Faculty    Staff    Faculty Resources    Open Positions         News           News Stories    Press Mentions         Events           CS calendar    Student Opportunities          Eyebrow menu    Break Through Tech    Giving    Alumni    UIC Engineering Home    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                     Instructional Computing Facilities  The computer science department maintains an instructional computing facility and remote servers, which serve its students’ computing needs for CS coursework.       Student Access   Each new student is assigned a CS account that expires one year after graduation. Your login may be checked at http://go.uic.edu/csaccount , and passwords are initially set to the student’s UIN. We highly encourage users to change their passwords after their initial login.  Students are given a space quota of 1 GB and print quota of 600 pages per semester.  Accounts can be accessed by logging on to the lab workstations or remote servers, allowing students the flexibility to complete their course work from the lab, home or work.       Computing Resources   The instructional computing facility offers the following equipment:  Department workstations   52 Linux machines (CentOS7)  1 printer  4 LCD monitors for student collaboration   Department remote servers   cs.uic.edu  cs.uic.edu  cs.uic.edu        Location and hours   Second floor of SEL (room 2254).  Monday – Thursday (during the fall and spring semesters): 8 a.m. to 11 p.m.  Friday (during the fall and spring semesters): 8 a.m. to 9 p.m.  In case of problems or errors, please contact the lab consultant on duty or email support@cs.uic.edu .
